name: Easiest Game Ever
description:
This game might make you rage depends if you are good at it there are 4 levels no checkpoints and red squares that kill you have fun

-controls-

A and D to move left and right

&&

space to jump but you don't really need it

This is the first game i have ever mode so, yes i know it is pretty rough but i hope you enjoy it

Btw i will be reading your feed back and updating the game
